lineage.Process: ExtractByMask NDVI_Sapowet_Imagery_2016.tif Sapowet_Tidesheds "E:\Coastal Habitat Restoration Team\UVVR Training\UVVR Training\Rasters\ndvi_clip" Inside "124314.6402 54547.2152999993 125669.6595 56469.9692000002 PROJCS["NAD_1983_2011_StatePlane_Rhode_Island_FIPS_3800",GEOGCS["GCS_NAD_1983_2011",DATUM["D_NAD_1983_2011",SPHEROID["GRS_1980",6378137.0,298.257222101]],PRIMEM["Greenwich",0.0],UNIT["Degree",0.0174532925199433]],PROJECTION["Transverse_Mercator"],PARAMETER["False_Easting",100000.0],PARAMETER["False_Northing",0.0],PARAMETER["Central_Meridian",-71.5],PARAMETER["Scale_Factor",0.99999375],PARAMETER["Latitude_Of_Origin",41.08333333333334],UNIT["Meter",1.0]]"

dataIdInfo.idPurp:
The normalized difference vegetation index of the 2016 NAIP imagery clipped to the boundaries of the Sapowet Marsh (Tiverton, RI) tidal watersheds polygon. Pixel resolution = 0.6 m.
The shapefile was created as part of a tutorial for imagery classification and calculation of the unvegetated - vegetated ratio (UVVR) for salt marsh systems.
